name: Migrate Tool Software For NSF files
short_description:
NSF to PST Convert get easy to use NSF to PST Converter. It is highly needed utility for users developed under SysTools group. It is capable to migrate all data as email, contact, task, calendar etc; also converts messages with all of its properties like to, from, cc, bcc, dates & time without having original data lost. NSF to PST Converter support conversion creating using NSF v8.5, 8.0, 7.0, 6.5, 6.0, 5.5 & 5.0 to PST 2010, 2007, 2003, XP, 2000, 98 & 97. It easily runs with All Windows version also Win7. Lotus NSF to PST File Converter helps administrators & other users to migrate NSF to PST file or Lotus Notes to Outlook & can preview user mailboxes & emails of Lotus Notes into MS Outlook. Software also converts Domino Server to Microsoft Exchange & also lets you convert NSF files of a user account to PST file. 

Just download the free trial version and evaluate its capabilities of nsf fils recovery: http://www.filesrecoverytools.com/nsf-to-pst-converter.html
summary: Capable To Migrate All Data as Email,Contact,Ttask, Calendar etc;
